All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
ActivatingEmergencyCommunications
This class represents the model for Activating Emergency Communications.
ActivatingEmergencyCommunicationsRepository
Repository for managing Activating Emergency Communications, including adding, updating, retrieving, and removing emergency communications requests.
Addresses
Class containing the addresses and ports used in the application.
AppLogger
Utility class for logging messages using SLF4J (Simple Logging Facade for Java).
ApproveActivatingEmergencyCommunicationRequestCommand
Command to approve or deny an Activating Emergency Communication request.
ApproveEmergencyResourceDistributionCommand
Command to approve or deny emergency resource distribution requests.
ApproveMassEvacuationRequestCommand
Command to approve or deny a mass evacuation request
ApproveUserCommand
Command to approve or deny a user in the system
CannotReadFileException
Exception thrown when a file cannot be read.
CannotWritetoFileException
Exception thrown when a file cannot be written to.
Channel
This class represents the model for a channel.
ChannelCreationCommand
Command for handling channel creation and removal operations.
ChannelMessage
This class represents a message sent in a channel.
ChannelMessageRepository
Repository for managing Channel Messages, including adding, updating, retrieving, and removing messages.
ChannelParticipationCommand
Command to handle a user's participation in a channel.
ChannelRepository
Repository for managing Channels, including adding, updating, retrieving, and removing channels.
CommandFactory
CommandFactory is responsible for creating specific command instances based on the given command name.
CommandsFromClient
This class contains all the commands that the client can send to the server.
DatabaseFiles
This class contains all the paths to the database files.
EmergencyResourceDistribution
This class represents the model for Emergency Resource Distribution.
EmergencyResourceDistributionRepository
Repository for managing emergency resource distribution records.
EncryptPassword
Utility class for hashing passwords using SHA-256 and verifying passwords against stored hashes.
FileUtils<T>
Utility class for reading and writing object lists to and from files.
GetApproveActivatingEmergencyCommunicationPendingApprovalsCommand
Command to fetch all pending Activating Emergency Communications requests for approval.
GetApproveEmergencyResourceDistributionPendingApprovalsCommand
Command class that handles the request for approving emergency resource distribution requests.
GetChannelsCommand
Command to retrieve and send a list of all available channels to the client.
GetMassEvacuationPendingApprovalsCommand
Command to get all pending Mass Evacuation Requests
GetMessageCommand
Command to retrieve messages from a channel or user and send them to the requesting user.
GetNotificationsCommand
Command class to handle fetching notifications for a user.
GetPendingApprovalsCommand
Command to get pending approvals
GetUsersCommand
Command to get all users from the database
IActivatingEmergencyCommunicationsRepository
Interface for the ActivatingEmergencyCommunicationsRepository, which extends the generic IRepository interface.
IChannelMessageRepository
Interface for the ChannelMessageRepository which extends the generic IRepository interface.
IChannelRepository
Interface for the ChannelRepository which extends the generic IRepository interface.
ICommand
Interface for commands to implement.
IEmergencyResourceDistributionRepository
Interface for the EmergencyResourceDistributionRepository which extends the generic IRepository interface.
IMassEvacuationRepository
Interface for the MassEvacuationRepository which extends the generic IRepository interface.
INotificationRepository
Interface for the NotificationRepository which extends the generic IRepository interface.
IRepository<T>
Interface for a generic repository that provides basic CRUD operations.
IUserMessageRepository
Interface for the UserMessageRepository which extends the generic IRepository interface.
IUserRepository
Interface for the UserRepository which extends the generic IRepository interface.
JsonConverter
Utility class for converting objects to and from JSON format.
LoginICommand
Command to handle user login requests.
LoginResponseDto
Data Transfer Object (DTO) for the login response.
Main
Main class to launch the server application.
MassEvacuation
This class represents the model for a Mass Evacuation.
MassEvacuationRepository
Repository for managing mass evacuation records.
Notification
This class represents a notification model.
NotificationRepository
Repository for managing notification records.
RegisterCommand
Command to handle user registration.
ReportsThread
A thread responsible for periodically generating and sending statistical reports about the server.
RequestActivatingEmergencyCommunicationCommand
Command to handle user requests for activating emergency communications.
RequestEmergencyResourceDistributionCommand
Command class that handles the request for emergency resource distribution.
RequestMassEvacuationCommand
Command to request a mass evacuation.
SendMessageCommand
Command that handles sending messages to channels or users.
Server
The Server class is responsible for accepting client connections and managing communication.
StatisticsService
Service class responsible for retrieving statistical information about the application.
StringUtils
Utility class for string manipulation.
SynchronizedArrayList<T>
A thread-safe implementation of an ArrayList.
User
This class represents a user in the system.
UserMessage
Represents a message sent by a user to another user.
UserMessageRepository
Repository for managing user messages.
UserRepository
Repository for managing user data.
UserResponseDto
Data Transfer Object (DTO) representing a user response.
UserTypes
Enum representing different user types with associated levels.
Validations
Utility class containing validation methods.
WorkerThread
A thread responsible for handling a specific client connection.
